game.name: SPORE™
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, RPG, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Be the architect of your own universe with Spore, an exciting single-player adventure. From Single Cell to Galactic God, evolve your creature in a universe of your own creations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Be the architect of your own universe with Spore, an exciting single-player adventure. From Single Cell to Galactic God, evolve your creature in a universe of your own creations.

reviewHighlights.text: the game is great and i love it, BUT, if you want to play with online features without much of a hassle it's much easier (and cheaper) to buy the game...
GREAT GAME, played it first time in 2014, and now playing it again in late 2025, wish it come back again with a remake or spore 2.
